overview: I had been planning to make something called 'FUCK THE WORLD' for a while. The title was going to be about redemption, about letting go when life starts to suffocate, escaping to the realm of the senses. FUCK FEAR, FUCK THE GRID, feel the moment like it's your last night on earth - A fever dream that takes place on that mythical last night.
tagline: A fever dream that takes place on that mythical last night
title: Fuck The World
